entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
